content: The delusional fool also believes that his travel ban is not based on religion, is designed to keep us safe, but doesn’t have Saudi Arabia on it. He also thinks that he will have health care for all, but it’s a tax cut for the rich. He thinks he’s for the people but, who has appointed obviously shows he’s otherwise. And considering that he and his criminal enterprise won’t condemn this last bigoted snake Steve King, confirms it even more. But his retarded cult followers will believe anything. Thankfully, I have way more sense
